#summary Description of the /table/create/ page.
#labels Phase-Design

=== Introduction ===
The table create page is used to create a table on the server.

=== Method ===
HTTP PUT 

=== Request ===
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<name>lasvegas</name>
}}}

*The table name is not being used at the moment.*

=== Response ===
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<id>5689456</id>
}}}
